restaurants.title: Donaufelderhof
restaurants.description: A nice garden with relaxing atmosphere. Aside from traditional Austrian food you might as well order rarely seen dishes like a Langos Burger

restaurants.title: Restaurant Mader
restaurants.description: An old traditional Austrian restaurant run by a hospitable family for many years. Their masterpieces are Wiener Schnitzel and Gulasch.

restaurants.title: Gastwirtschaft Schilling
restaurants.description: They have a large selection of beer and the portion sizes are huge. It is very authentic, everything tastes so yummy.

restaurants.title: Rados Gastwirtschaft
restaurants.description: One of the best places in town to eat ribs! Friendly staff, great prices - you simply feel welcome as soon as you step in.

restaurants.title: Amerling Beisl
restaurants.description: A wonderful taste experience. Enjoy a nice evening, sitting in a patio with a slightly italian flair and fast waiters.

restaurants.title: Zwölf Apostelkeller
restaurants.description: Tucked into an unassuming side street in the 1st district, Zwölf Apostkeller is a deceptively cavernous old style beer hall, hidden in a centuries old cellar.

restaurants.title: Le Bol
restaurants.description: A very charming french bistro with living-room atmosphere. Makes you feel cozy and as if you were in a cafe in the middle of Paris.

restaurants.title: Brasserie de la Marie
restaurants.description: Carmen, the owner is always making sure, everyone enjoys the atmosphere with the slightly different furnishings. A tasty variety of delicious food!

restaurants.title: Léontine
restaurants.description: Along with a glass of french wine you may enjoy traditional french cuisine. You should make a reservation, do that early enough.

restaurants.title: Émile Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.description: An exquisite range of dishes, making you want more. The Rainbow Bowl is highly recommended. Very courteous staff and elegant atmosphere with a bar-flavour.

restaurants.title: Creperie
restaurants.description: This fabulous place is packed with lots of different flavoured crepes you simply can't get enough of. Very welcoming and relaxing atmosphere.

restaurants.title: CouCou
restaurants.description: With a laid-back though extra-ordinary atmosphere the CouCou attracts its guests. Friendly waiters and even the music makes you wanna stay for another drink after dinner.

restaurants.title: Goldfisch
restaurants.description: Famous for its tasty seafood, this really small and simple place is highly recommended if you are into eating lobster, octopus or local fishes and don't need fancy furnishing.

restaurants.title: Fischrestaurant Bodulo
restaurants.description: Italian friends recommended this pearl.Bodulo is one of the best places to go in vienna, if you want to enjoy excellent seafood and a mediterranean atmosphere.

restaurants.title: Wulfisch
restaurants.description: A tiny, simple but addictive location!Tasty scents and a wide variety of seafood wraps, makes your mouth water as soon as you enter. Try one of the delicious salads. It is worth it.

restaurants.title: Fischrestaurant Nautilus
restaurants.description: Enjoy a relaxing and wonderful evening at the Nautilus. In the middle of the famous Naschmarkt, this place is a must go if you are into seafood.

restaurants.title: Fischrestaurant Kaj
restaurants.description: Enjoy an impressive variety of fresh fish and family-friendly ambience. Simply delicious! The owners are seemingly happy if their guests enjoy their stay.

restaurants.title: Lubin
restaurants.description: Gourmet fish and a relaxing ambience will make you come back to Lubin, one of Vienna's best fish restaurants. It is not only a nice place to have dinner but you can also buy a variety of fish to take home.

restaurants.title: Pizzeria Ruffino
restaurants.description: Quality paired with very talkative waiters. An addictive combination with a great variety of pizza, noodles and co. Convince yourself that Ruffino is worth a visit.

restaurants.title: Disco Volante
restaurants.description: With a pizza oven shaped like a huge disco ball in the middle of the room, which the restaurant owns its name to, eating pizza becomes an adventure. Rumour has it that even italians admire their pizza-baking-skills!

restaurants.title: Pizza Randale
restaurants.description: You want fresh ingredients on a delicious pizza? Then make sure you got to Pizza Randale early enough because in the evenings it is always crowded. The food is just yummy.

restaurants.title: Via Toledo Enopizzeria
restaurants.description: Owner Francesco Calò was voted world's best pizza cook in Salerno. Furthermore Via Toledo surprises with innovative Pizza creations. Definitely worth a visit, or two or three....

restaurants.title: Bio-Pizzeria Vero
restaurants.description: Vero is said to be Vienna's first organic Pizza restaurant, setting also a new appearance-trend. Oriental lamps mix with industrial ambience. Aside from the full grian pizza you should definitely try the Nutella-pizza if you prefer it sweet.

restaurants.title: Pizzeria Mafiosi
restaurants.description: Surrounded by wooden furniture and maritime decoration, eating Pizza at Mafiosi feels a little bit like being on a pirate ship. Be very hungry when you go there, the portions are large and of course inviting.

restaurants.title: Addicted to Rock Bar & Burger
restaurants.description: A drink and a burger with Rock n'Roll - flair. Sounds tempting? We agree. All the burgers are tasty but the Addicted-Burger not only tastes good but comes with a black bread. Two thumbs up for this small sister of the Hardrock Cafe.

restaurants.title: Omnom Burger
restaurants.description: Lots of different burgers with additional ingredients to choose from. Omnom is widespread in Vienna and we are a fan too. Enjoy a fresh-made burger in a relaxing and simple surrounding.

restaurants.title: Teddy's American Burger
restaurants.description: If you are a fan of the Back to the future movies you will love this diner. Have a tasty burger and feel like you woke up in the 50ies. Worth a visit.

restaurants.title: Weinschenke - Feinste Burger
restaurants.description: One would not expect such delicious burger creations in a restaurant with such misleading name. This is an insider tip from us. The food is marvellous, the furnishing unexpected for a burger location. Check out the extra-ordinary paintings on their wall.

restaurants.title: Burger's Bar Wien
restaurants.description: Probably the biggest burgers in town we know. The air smells of barbecue, the street outside a bit noisy but who cares when you are about to bite in a tasty, fresh burger.

restaurants.title: Hawidere Beer & Burger
restaurants.description: A cult place for burger and music lovers. Enjoy tasty burger variations and occasionally you are accompanied by local bands while your eating. Authentic and down to earth.

restaurants.title: Aloha Bowl
restaurants.description: Trendy indeed. Create your individual bowl, suitable for your taste or choose one of the - as the owner calls it - five palms of Aloha bowls. They are all delicious and rare, so try something new and vegan like the Ponzu Salmon bowl.

restaurants.title: Apapika Bowls
restaurants.description: The main idea behind Apapika Bowls was the love for travelling and the inspiration of different food cultures. The output - unique and purely fresh bowls with an arabic touch, consumed in a relaxing ambience.

restaurants.title: Honu Tiki Bowl
restaurants.description: Honu Tiki Bowls are made from the freshest ingredients and designed to make you happy! Signature dish or Build Your Own Bowl? It‘s up to you. Food can be pleasure

restaurants.title: Nana7
restaurants.description: The Nana7 promises an explosion of taste in your mouth and this is what you get when you eat a delicious, maybe spicy bowl in a family-like ambience.

restaurants.title: Wiki Wiki Poke
restaurants.description: The owners of this friendly and passionate restaurant believe that getting together and enjoying food needs to be celebrated. That is why the couple opened up a restaurant in the heart of Vienna with a family-like flair.

restaurants.title: El Hac Juices & Bowls
restaurants.description: If you are looking for healthy wraps, bowls and fresh juices, this is the right place to go to! Very delicious, mostly for takeaway in a lunch break.

restaurants.title: Restaurant Odysseus
restaurants.description: If you want a touch of greece and a welcoming atmosphere, go to Odysseus. One of the best Moussakas in town and staff is entertainingly relaxed. Be prepared to get an ouzo on the house when you leave.

restaurants.title: To Ellinikon
restaurants.description: A very stylish greek restaurant. Aside from the marvellous food the huge photographs of the wall create the feeling of being outside the city on holiday.

restaurants.title: Rembetiko - Hellenic Restaurant
restaurants.description: A feelgood greek with astonishing starter plates. The fish dishes are also very delicious. Relax and enjoy in a friendly atmosphere!

restaurants.title: Restaurant Jamas
restaurants.description: The friendly enjoys recommending dishes and good wines, always smiling. A nice and cozy atmosphere and focused on traditional greek food.

restaurants.title: Restaurant Athene
restaurants.description: A traditional greek restaurant in the luxurious 19th district though affordable. The portions could be bigger, but the food is very delicious and worth a taste! Especially the Gyros.

restaurants.title: Restaurant Akropolis
restaurants.description: This rather huge greek restaurant is very richly decorated and looks elegant. But the food is affordable and the waiters are very courteous. See for yourself.

restaurants.title: Cafe Ansari
restaurants.description: Among all kinds of georgian dishes, the turkish specialities at Ansari are highly recommendable. The atmosphere is relaxing and family-friendly.

restaurants.title: Baschly
restaurants.description: Mostly for take-away but you can also have a seat and enjoy your food in a small seating area. Stylish food creations and very friendyl staff. Definitely a winner if you enjoy good tastes.

restaurants.title: Kent Restaurant
restaurants.description: Close to the very vivid Brunnenmarkt is the well-known Kent, with many mouthwatering smells and plenty of dishes to choose from. Getting hungry already.

restaurants.title: Diwan Holzkohlegrill
restaurants.description: The smell of barbecue and spices makes you want to order immediately. Diwan is famous for its Döner or Kebab. Though the restaurant itself is not too extravagant. But if you are hungry this will be a very good place to go.

restaurants.title: Sentepe
restaurants.description: If you are more about getting your mouths on some tasty traditional Turkish food, and less about a fine and fancy dining experience, Sentepe is your go-to for a quick bite.

restaurants.title: Damak Grillrestaurant & Cafe
restaurants.description: Traditional turkish cuisine in a comfortable atmosphere. There is also their famous Etli Ekmek ( minced meat on a very thin crispy bread ) and their various Pide variations.

restaurants.title: Restaurant Pars
restaurants.description: Amidst traditional persian furnishing you can enjoy unspeakably good persian food. The rather extravagant appearance is really worth a visit aside from the dishes of course.

restaurants.title: Restaurant Kolbe
restaurants.description: Run by an ambitious family who is still working together in the restaurant after 14 years, the Kolbe is a highly recommended place when it comes to really authentic persian food.

restaurants.title: Hatam
restaurants.description: Opinions differ when it comes to Hatam, which already exists in Vienna for over 20 years now. Some say try Kudipeh Kebab. We say try everything there but don't leave without tasting the safran rice.

restaurants.title: Arezu - modern persian cuisine
restaurants.description: Arezu chose a more modern persian style of cuisine and is also highly recommandable. You will be surprised of flavours and varieties in this

restaurants.title: Adish - Cafe Restaurant & Bar
restaurants.description: This mixture of Bar and Restaurant is really appealing. Diving into the world of persian cuisine is tasty there. Also a nice and relaxing ambience.

restaurants.title: Restaurant Nayeb
restaurants.description: We discovered this tiny restaurant by coincidence. At noon you can try different persian dishes at a delicious buffet. A secret we share with you

restaurants.title: Happy Buddha
restaurants.description: Although the interior looks a little bit like a traditional viennese so called Gasthaus, they really know their way around when it comes to traditionally spiced chinese food.

restaurants.title: China Restaurant Sun
restaurants.description: This is the place to go if you love dim sum in all varieties. They also have specialties on the menu which change regularly. An elegant way to enjoy chinese dishes.

restaurants.title: Restaurant ON
restaurants.description: In the style of a viennese bar the ON is a relaxing place to enjoy your meal. It can definitely compete with traditional chinese restaurants but adding some modern flavours to their menue.

restaurants.title: China Restaurant Hua Qiang
restaurants.description: Very modern design and a pleasure spending time there. Aside from the fabulous food you can enjoy the elegant but not too overwhelming atmosphere.

restaurants.title: Yuan
restaurants.description: Satisfying price-performance ratio and large portions. Also a good place to go when you are really hungry, aside from the fact, that the appearance of this place is inviting.,

restaurants.title: China Restaurant No.27
restaurants.description: Behind No.27 hides a cozy restaurant with focus on szechuan cuisine. Trendy and an enlightening atmosphere will make you want to linger the whole evening.

restaurants.title: Más! Restaurant & Cocktail Bar
restaurants.description: A mixture of a restaurant and an aesthetic bar, pretty trendy in vienna but yet very hospitable. The spiced chicken is simply marvellous, followed by one of the cocktails they offer.

restaurants.title: Mosquito Mexican Restaurant & Cocktail Bar
restaurants.description: Traditional mexican cuisine spiced up and suitable for viennese surroundings. Delicious and versatile dishes. Don't forget to eat Churros for dessert.

restaurants.title: Santos Neubau/ Mexican Grill & Bar
restaurants.description: Santos looks more like a cocktailbar than a restaurant. Very impressive bar interior. It is a pleasure to choose a good drink of choice after a full and wonderful meal.

restaurants.title: Gorilla Kitchen
restaurants.description: Trendy and small the Gorilla Kitchen is tempting you to linger and eat more than one burrito or bowl from their exquisite menu. Stylish and simple.

restaurants.title: Pancho
restaurants.description: Pancho is a bit similar to Santos according to what they offer but the atmosphere is a little bit more down to earth.

restaurants.title: Doña Irma
restaurants.description: Doña Irma is well-known for its traditional, delicious mexican food. But especially the colorful and innovative interior makes you feel like your are in Mexico for a short time-travel-trip.

restaurants.title: Rani
restaurants.description: Amidst a rather elegant surrounding enjoy the traditionally spiced dishes that Rani serves, prepared with witt. An explosion of different spices. Simply a pleasure.

restaurants.title: Tulsi
restaurants.description: Insiders say that at Tulsi they have discovered India's hidden kitchen secrets. Traditional flavours mingle with new interpreted tastes.

restaurants.title: In-dish
restaurants.description: A friendly and relaxing ambeince in which you can enjoy a delicious Tandoori Chicken or other indian specialities. High quality food and service.

restaurants.title: Mach ma Curry
restaurants.description: This higly reccommendable location is a mixture of cozy bar and elegant restaurant, offering a great variety of innovative indian curries.

restaurants.title: Nirvana
restaurants.description: The owners, an elderly couple with a devotion to food and spices offer a small variety of dishes, a rather extravagant choice. Try Chicken Tikka if you like it spicy or simply go with a delicious curry.

restaurants.title: Curry Vibes - Spice up your Life!
restaurants.description: The name indicates a tastful adventure which it is indeed to eat one of the large curry variations or a typically indian dessert. The athmosphere is simple but cozy.
